---
title: Webhooks
category: PRO plugin
order: 1300
video: /videos/video.mp4
videoDesc: A webhook registers in Mailchimp a newsletter subscription from InstaWP.
---

**Receive and process incoming data from any service via customized webhooks**, published directly within the wp-admin. Any event generated by an external service can be processed by your WordPress site via a suitable persisted query.

Store information on incoming Slack messages, deployments on Netlify, merged pull requests on GitHub, email subscriptions on ConvertKit, workflows on Zapier, and more.
